oai_dc:dc.dc:title: .22 caliber Smith & Wesson revolver
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This .22 caliber revolver was found on the grounds of the battlefield at Parker's Crossroads, Tenn. It has serial number 1960. The pistol is a Smith & Wesson, No. 1, First Issue, Type 3. The No. 1, First Issues were made from 1857-1860. A very common example of a pistol available on the civilian market on the eve of the Civil War.
